### Logsï¼š

 ```bash
 # daemon mode
 journalctl -u v2raya | tail -n 50
 sudo tail -n 50 /var/log/v2raya/v2raya.log
 
 # docker mode
 docker logs v2raya
 ```

 You can also paste the log that comes from web administration page
